name: blocxlide
description:
A true test of logical thinking and quick problem solving
blocxlide is an arcade puzzle game where you must quickly and strategically slide blocks to create miniature art. Players are graded based on how quickly they can create the target image with as few moves as possible, with only the most efficient earning the elusive "S" rank.

The rules of the game
Players can only move entire rows left or right, and entire columns up or down. The game grid wraps around itself so pushing a block off the grid will make it emerge on the opposite side.

Endlessly re-playable
Whether you're fine tuning your strategy to improve your grades, creating your own puzzles in the simple to use puzzle editor or tackling randomized challenges in the unlockable Shuffle mode , there's always something new bound to make you scratch your head.

Fun for all skill levels
With chasing higher ranks being completely optional, players are free to take their time with complex stages, and with puzzles ranging from mind-numbingly easy to brain-bustingly brutal there is something here for everyone to get their cogs turning.

Features:
  • Addictive puzzling gameplay
  • Simple to learn controls
  • Easy to use Puzzle Editor
  • Tough as nails ranking system
  • Unlockable Shuffle Mode
